New Records: Kai Havertz has one goal and one assist in one match for Germany in UEFA Euro 2024.
Jamal Musiala has one goal in one match for Germany in UEFA Euro 2024.
Florian Wirtz has one goal for Germany in one match in UEFA Euro 2024.
Barnabas Varga has one goal (his first in UEFA European Championship play) and one assist in one match for Hungary in UEFA Euro 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: Germany defeated Scotland 5-1 in their previous match in UEFA Euro 2024.
Hungary lost to Switzerland 3-1 in their previous match in UEFA Euro 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is held at Mercedes-Benz Arena in Stuttgart, Germany.
